sections.number: 71.28.010 - Contracts by boundary counties or cities therein
sections.text:
RCW 71.28.010

Contracts by boundary counties or cities therein.

Any county, or city within a county which is situated on the state boundaries is authorized to contract for mental health services with a county situated in either the states of Oregon or Idaho, located on the boundaries of such states with the state of Washington.

Any county, or city within a county which is situated on the state boundaries is authorized to contract for mental health services with a county situated in either the states of Oregon or Idaho, located on the boundaries of such states with the state of Washington.

[ 1988 c 176 s 911; 1977 ex.s. c 80 s 44; 1967 c 84 s 1.]

Purpose—Intent—Severability—1977 ex.s. c 80: See notes following RCW 4.16.190.

Purpose—Intent—Severability—1977 ex.s. c 80: See notes following RCW 4.16.190.
